title: दिल्ली में छठ पूजा की पुरानी तस्वीरें हाल की बताकर प्रसारित
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Hindu women worship the Sun god in the polluted waters of the river Yamuna during the Hindu religious festival of Chatth Puja in New Delhi, India, November 3, 2019. REUTERS/@adnanabidipic.twitter.com/0gp7EDiwkO
